00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File: mia_compare.c
00051  *
00052  *  Description: Height reduction optimization on compares.
00053  *
00054  *  Creation Date: June 1997
00055  *
00056  *  Author: Bob McGowan
00057  *
00058 \*****************************************************************************/
00059 /* 09/17/02 REK Updating to use the new Ltahoe opcode map and completers
00060  *              scheme. */
00061 
00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 #include "mia_internal.h"
00065 
00066 #define VERBOSE
00067 #undef DEBUG
00068 
00069 #ifdef DEBUG
00070 #define VERBOSE
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 static L_Oper *find_add_for_compare (L_Oper * compare, int operand_num);
00074 static int Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (L_Cb * cb, L_Oper * add,
00075                                                L_Oper * compare,
00076                                                int compare_operand_num);
00077 static void Change_lte_to_lt (L_Oper * compare);
00078 static void Change_gte_to_gt (L_Oper * compare);
00079 
00080 
00081 /****************************************************************************
00082  *
00083  * routine: Mopti_compare_height_reduction()
00084  * purpose: Perform height reduction of compare ops dependent on an
00085  *          arithmetic op.
00086  * input:
00087  * output:
00088  * returns:
00089  * modified:
00090  * note:
00091  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092 
00093 int
00094 Mopti_loop_compare_height_reduction (L_Func * fn)
00095 {
00096   L_Loop *loop;
00097   L_Cb *cb;
00098   int n_loop_cb;
00099   int cb_spot;
00100   int *loop_cb_id;
00101   int change = 0;
00102 
00103   for (loop = fn->first_loop; loop; loop = loop->next_loop)
00104     {
00105       n_loop_cb = Set_size (loop->loop_cb);
00106       if (!n_loop_cb)
00107         continue;
00108       loop_cb_id = malloc (n_loop_cb * sizeof (int));
00109       Set_2array (loop->loop_cb, loop_cb_id);
00110 
00111       for (cb_spot = 0; cb_spot < n_loop_cb; cb_spot++)
00112         {
00113           cb = L_cb_hash_tbl_find (fn->cb_hash_tbl, loop_cb_id[cb_spot]);
00114           if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) ||
00115               !L_find_attr (cb->attr, "kernel"))
00116             change += Mopti_compare_height_reduction (fn, cb, loop,
00117                                                       n_loop_cb, loop_cb_id);
00118         }                       /* for cb_spot */
00119       free (loop_cb_id);
00120     }                           /* for loop */
00121   return change;
00122 }                               /* Mopti_loop_compare_height_reduction */
00123 
00124 
00125 /****************************************************************************
00126  *
00127  * routine: Mopti_compare_height_reduction()
00128  * purpose: Perform height reduction of compare ops dependent on an
00129  *          arithmetic op.
00130  *          There are three cases which can be optimized:
00131  *            case 1:   add r1 = r2,C1    where C is a constant
00132  *                      cmp r1,C2
00133  *               becomes
00134  *                      cmp r2,C2-C1
00135  *                      add r1 = r2,C1
00136  *               This also works with subtract.
00137  *
00138  *            case 2a:  add       r1 = r2,1
00139  *                      cmp.le    r1,r3
00140  *               becomes
00141  *                      cmp.lt    r2,r3
00142  *                      add       r1 = r2,1
00143  *               Notice that the order of the operations must be reversed
00144  *                 in case r2 is r1.
00145  *            
00146  *            case 2b:  add       r1 = r2,-1
00147  *                      cmp.ge    r1,r3
00148  *               becomes
00149  *                      cmp.gt    r2,r3
00150  *                      add       r1 = r2,-1
00151  *
00152  *            case 2c:  add       r3 = r2,1
00153  *                      cmp.ge    r1,r3
00154  *               becomes
00155  *                      cmp.gt    r1,r2
00156  *                      add       r3 = r2,1
00157  *            
00158  *            case 2d:  add       r3 = r2,-1
00159  *                      cmp.le    r1,r3
00160  *               becomes
00161  *                      cmp.lt    r1,r2
00162  *                      add       r3 = r2,-1
00163  *
00164  *            case 3:   add r1 = r1,C     where r1 is a loop induction variable
00165  *                                          only altered here
00166  *                      cmp r1,r2         where r2 is loop invariant
00167  *               becomes
00168  *                      add r4 = r2,-C    place in the loop preheader
00169  *                      ...
00170  *                      cmp r1,r4
00171  *                      add r1 = r1,C
00172  * input: cb - cb to optimize
00173  *        loop - NULL is okay, just means that we are not in the loop.
00174  * output:
00175  * returns:
00176  * modified:
00177  * note: Assumes that add and compare have the same predicate.
00178  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00179 
00180 int
00181 Mopti_compare_height_reduction (L_Func * fn, L_Cb * cb, L_Loop * loop,
00182                                 int loop_n_cb, int *loop_cb)
00183 {
00184   L_Oper *compare;
00185   L_Oper *add_op;
00186   L_Oper *new_op;
00187   int new_constant;
00188   int count = 0;
00189 
00190   for (compare = cb->first_op; compare; compare = compare->next_op)
00191     {
00192       if (!L_general_int_predicate_define_opcode (compare))
00193         continue;
00194 
00195       /* A compare has been found.
00196          Look for the add which has a constant as src[1] */
00197 
00198       add_op = find_add_for_compare (compare, 1);
00199       if (add_op)
00200         {
00201           if (L_is_int_constant (compare->src[0]))
00202             {
00203               /* case 1a:
00204                  add r1 = C1,r2    where C is a constant
00205                  cmp C2,r1 */
00206               new_constant =
00207                 compare->src[0]->value.i - add_op->src[0]->value.i;
00208               if (!SIMM_8 (new_constant))
00209                 continue;
00210 
00211               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op, compare,
00212                                                        0))
00213                 continue;
00214 
00215               compare->src[0]->value.i = new_constant;
00216               L_delete_operand (compare->src[1]);
00217               compare->src[1] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[1]);
00218 
00219 #ifdef VERBOSE
00220               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(1a): add const, cmp const on "
00221                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00222                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00223 #endif
00224               count++;
00225               continue;
00226             }                   /* if */
00227 
00228           if (LT_is_R0_operand (compare->src[0]))
00229             {
00230               /* case 1b:  same as 1a except process r0
00231                  add r1 = C1,r2    where C is a constant
00232                  cmp C2,r1 */
00233               if (!SIMM_8 (add_op->src[0]->value.i))
00234                 break;
00235 
00236               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed
00237                   (cb, add_op, compare, 0))
00238                 continue;
00239 
00240               L_delete_operand (compare->src[0]);
00241               compare->src[0] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[0]);
00242               compare->src[0]->value.i = -compare->src[0]->value.i;
00243               L_delete_operand (compare->src[1]);
00244               compare->src[1] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[1]);
00245 #ifdef VERBOSE
00246               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(1b): add const, cmp const on "
00247                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00248                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00249 #endif
00250               count++;
00251               continue;
00252             }                   /* if */
00253 
00254           if ((add_op->src[0]->value.i == 1) && L_int_ge_cmp_opcode (compare))
00255             {
00256               /* case 2a:
00257                  add       r1 = 1,r2
00258                  cmp.ge    r3,r1
00259                  becomes
00260                  add       r1 = 1,r2
00261                  cmp.gt    r3,r2 */
00262               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op, compare,
00263                                                        0))
00264                 continue;
00265 
00266               Change_gte_to_gt (compare);
00267 
00268 #ifdef VERBOSE
00269               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(2a): add +1, cmp.gt on "
00270                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00271                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00272 #endif
00273               count++;
00274               continue;
00275             }                   /* if */
00276 
00277           if ((add_op->src[0]->value.i == -1) &&
00278               L_int_le_cmp_opcode (compare))
00279             {
00280               /* case 2b:
00281                  add    r1 = -1,r2
00282                  cmp.le r3,r1
00283                  becomes
00284                  add    r1 = -1,r2
00285                  cmp.lt r3,r2
00286                */
00287               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op, compare,
00288                                                        0))
00289                 continue;
00290               Change_lte_to_lt (compare);
00291 
00292 #ifdef VERBOSE
00293               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(2b): add -1, cmp.lt on "
00294                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00295                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00296 #endif
00297               count++;
00298               continue;
00299             }                   /* if */
00300 
00301           if (loop)
00302             {
00303               if (L_same_operand (add_op->dest[0], add_op->src[1]) &&
00304                   L_unique_def_in_loop (loop, loop_cb, loop_n_cb, add_op)
00305                   && L_is_loop_inv_operand (loop, loop_cb, loop_n_cb,
00306                                             compare->src[0]))
00307                 {
00308                   /* case 3:
00309                    *   add r1 = C,r1     where r1 is a loop induction
00310                    *                              variable only altered here
00311                    *   cmp r2,r1         where r2 is loop invariant
00312                    * becomes
00313                    *   add r4 = -C,r2    place in the loop preheader
00314                    *   ...
00315                    *   cmp r4,r1
00316                    *   add r1 = C,r1 
00317                    * The add and compare need to be reordered for this to
00318                    * work */
00319                   if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op,
00320                                                            compare, 0))
00321                     continue;
00322 
00323                   new_op = L_create_new_op (Lop_ADD);
00324                   new_op->proc_opc = TAHOEop_ADDS;
00325                   new_op->dest[0] =
00326                     L_new_register_operand (++(fn->max_reg_id),
00327                                             L_CTYPE_LLONG, L_PTYPE_NULL);
00328                   new_op->src[0] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[0]);
00329                   new_op->src[0]->value.i = -new_op->src[0]->value.i;
00330                   new_op->src[1] = compare->src[0];
00331                   L_insert_oper_after (loop->preheader, new_op,
00332                                        loop->preheader->last_op);
00333 
00334                   compare->src[0] = L_copy_operand (new_op->dest[0]);
00335 
00336 #ifdef VERBOSE
00337                   fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(3a): loop inv cmp operand on "
00338                            "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00339                            add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00340 #endif
00341                   count++;
00342                   continue;
00343                 }               /* if */
00344             }                   /* if */
00345         }                       /* if */
00346 
00347       add_op = find_add_for_compare (compare, 0);
00348       if (add_op)
00349         {
00350 #ifdef DEBUG
00351           fprintf (stderr, "  Found add op %d for compare op %d\n",
00352                    add_op->id, compare->id);
00353 #endif
00354 
00355           if (L_is_int_constant (compare->src[1]))
00356             {
00357               /* case 1c:
00358                  add r1 = C1,r2    where C is a constant
00359                  cmp r1,C2 */
00360               new_constant =
00361                 compare->src[1]->value.i - add_op->src[0]->value.i;
00362               if (!SIMM_8 (new_constant))
00363                 continue;
00364 
00365               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed
00366                   (cb, add_op, compare, 1))
00367                 continue;
00368 
00369               compare->src[1]->value.i = new_constant;
00370               L_delete_operand (compare->src[0]);
00371               compare->src[0] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[1]);
00372 
00373 #ifdef VERBOSE
00374               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(1c): add const, cmp const on "
00375                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00376                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00377 #endif
00378               count++;
00379               continue;
00380             }                   /* if */
00381 
00382           if (LT_is_R0_operand (compare->src[1]))
00383             {
00384               /* case 1d:  same as 1a except process r0
00385                  add r1 = C1,r2    where C is a constant
00386                  cmp r1,C2 */
00387               if (!SIMM_8 (add_op->src[0]->value.i))
00388                 break;
00389 
00390               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed
00391                   (cb, add_op, compare, 1))
00392                 continue;
00393 
00394               L_delete_operand (compare->src[0]);
00395               compare->src[1] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[0]);
00396               compare->src[1]->value.i = -compare->src[1]->value.i;
00397               L_delete_operand (compare->src[0]);
00398               compare->src[0] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[1]);
00399 #ifdef VERBOSE
00400               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(1d): add const, cmp const on "
00401                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00402                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00403 #endif
00404               count++;
00405               continue;
00406             }                   /* if */
00407 
00408           if ((add_op->src[0]->value.i == 1) && L_int_le_cmp_opcode (compare))
00409             {
00410               /* case 2c:
00411                  add       r1 = 1,r2
00412                  cmp.le    r1,r3
00413                  becomes
00414                  add       r1 = 1,r2
00415                  cmp.lt    r2,r3, */
00416               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op, compare,
00417                                                        1))
00418                 continue;
00419 
00420               Change_lte_to_lt (compare);
00421 
00422 #ifdef VERBOSE
00423               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(2c): add +1, cmp.lt on "
00424                        "add op %d and compare op %d aving %f cycles\n",
00425                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00426 #endif
00427               count++;
00428               continue;
00429             }                   /* if */
00430 
00431           if ((add_op->src[0]->value.i == -1) &&
00432               L_int_ge_cmp_opcode (compare))
00433             {
00434               /* case 2d:
00435                  add    r1 = -1,r2
00436                  cmp.ge r1,r3
00437                  becomes
00438                  add    r1 = -1,r2
00439                  cmp.gt r2,r3
00440                */
00441               if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op, compare,
00442                                                        1))
00443                 continue;
00444 
00445               Change_gte_to_gt (compare);
00446 
00447 #ifdef VERBOSE
00448               fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(2d): add -1, cmp.gt on "
00449                        "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00450                        add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00451 #endif
00452               count++;
00453               continue;
00454             }                   /* if */
00455 
00456           if (loop)
00457             {
00458               if (L_same_operand (add_op->dest[0], add_op->src[1]) &&
00459                   L_unique_def_in_loop (loop, loop_cb, loop_n_cb, add_op)
00460                   && L_is_loop_inv_operand (loop, loop_cb, loop_n_cb,
00461                                             compare->src[0]))
00462                 {
00463                   /* case 3:
00464                    *   add r1 = C,r1     where r1 is a loop induction
00465                    *                              variable only altered here
00466                    *   cmp r2,r1         where r2 is loop invariant
00467                    * becomes
00468                    *   add r4 = -C,r2    place in the loop preheader
00469                    *   ...
00470                    *   cmp r4,r1
00471                    *   add r1 = C,r1 
00472                    * Add and compare need to be reordered for this to work */
00473                   if (!Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (cb, add_op,
00474                                                            compare, 1))
00475                     continue;
00476 
00477                   new_op = L_create_new_op (Lop_ADD);
00478                   new_op->proc_opc = TAHOEop_ADDS;
00479                   new_op->dest[0] =
00480                     L_new_register_operand (++(fn->max_reg_id),
00481                                             L_CTYPE_LLONG, L_PTYPE_NULL);
00482                   new_op->src[0] = L_copy_operand (add_op->src[0]);
00483                   new_op->src[0]->value.i = -new_op->src[0]->value.i;
00484                   new_op->src[1] = compare->src[0];
00485                   L_insert_oper_after (loop->preheader, new_op,
00486                                        loop->preheader->last_op);
00487 
00488                   compare->src[0] = L_copy_operand (new_op->dest[0]);
00489 
00490 #ifdef VERBOSE
00491                   fprintf (stderr, "Compare opt(3b): loop inv cmp operand on "
00492                            "add op %d and compare op %d saving %f cycles\n",
00493                            add_op->id, compare->id, cb->weight);
00494 #endif
00495                   count++;
00496                   continue;
00497                 }               /* if */
00498             }                   /* if */
00499         }                       /* if */
00500     }                           /* for compare */
00501   return count;
00502 }                               /* Mopti_compare_height_reduction */
00503 
00504 
00505 /****************************************************************************
00506  *
00507  * routine: find_add_for_compare()
00508  * purpose: Find an add or sub that creates the destination for the given
00509  *          operand on the compare.  The add and compare must have the same
00510  *          predicate.  This may be overly restrictive.
00511  *          Find: add cmp_src = const, reg
00512  * input: compare - the compare op
00513  *        operand_num - the operand on the compare to look for
00514  * output:
00515  * returns: A pointer to the add/sub op, or
00516  *          NULL if some other op defines the compare src or the define
00517  *          cannot be found.
00518  * modified:
00519  * note: This will convert a sub into an add.
00520  *       Stop if a branch is encountered or if a definition of
00521  *         the compare source (r1) is found.
00522  *         Stopping at a branch may be conservative.  We could check if
00523  *         the cmp is safe to move above branch.
00524  *       Also forcing same predicates is also overly restrictive.
00525  *       Only look for adds with constant as the first argument.
00526  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00527 
00528 static L_Oper *
00529 find_add_for_compare (L_Oper * compare, int operand_num)
00530 {
00531   L_Oper *op;
00532   L_Operand *temp;
00533 
00534   for (op = compare->prev_op;
00535        op && !L_general_branch_opcode (op); op = op->prev_op)
00536     {
00537       if (L_is_dest_operand (compare->src[operand_num], op))
00538         {
00539           if (L_int_add_opcode (op))
00540             {
00541               if (L_is_int_constant (op->src[0]) &&
00542                   PG_equivalent_predicates_ops (compare, op))
00543                 {
00544                   return (op);
00545                 }               /* if */
00546             }                   /* if */
00547           else
00548             {
00549               if (L_int_sub_opcode (op))
00550                 {
00551                   if (L_is_int_constant (op->src[1]) &&
00552                       PG_equivalent_predicates_ops (compare, op))
00553                     {
00554                       L_change_opcode (op, Lop_ADD);
00555                       op->proc_opc = TAHOEop_ADDS;
00556                       temp = op->src[0];
00557                       op->src[0] = op->src[1];
00558                       op->src[1] = temp;
00559                       op->src[1]->value.i = -op->src[1]->value.i;
00560                       return (op);
00561                     }           /* if */
00562                 }               /* if */
00563             }                   /* else */
00564           return (NULL);
00565         }                       /* if */
00566     }                           /* for op */
00567   return (NULL);
00568 }                               /* find_add_for_compare */
00569 
00570 
00571 /****************************************************************************
00572  *
00573  * routine: Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed()
00574  * purpose: Switch the order of the add and compare if needed.  This will be
00575  *          necessary if the dest is the same as the source to the add.
00576  *             add r1 = C,r2    where C is a constant
00577  *             cmp r3,r1 
00578  * input:
00579  * output:
00580  * returns: 2 if swapped, 1 if no swap is needed, 0 if swap is needed but
00581  *          cannot be performed.
00582  * modified:
00583  * note: Assumes no branches between add and compare.
00584  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00585 
00586 static int
00587 Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed (L_Cb * cb, L_Oper * add,
00588                                     L_Oper * compare, int compare_operand_num)
00589 {
00590   if (L_same_operand (add->dest[0], add->src[1]))
00591     {
00592       /* The add and compare need to be reordered for this to work */
00593       if (L_no_uses_between (add->dest[0], add, compare) &&
00594           L_no_danger (L_is_macro (add->dest[0]) /* macro flag */ ,
00595                        0 /* load floag */ , 0 /* store flag */ ,
00596                        add, compare))
00597         {
00598           /* move the add below the compare */
00599           L_remove_oper (cb, add);
00600           L_insert_oper_after (cb, compare, add);
00601           return (2);
00602         }                       /* if */
00603       else
00604         {
00605           if (L_no_defs_between (compare->src[compare_operand_num], add,
00606                                  compare) &&
00607               L_all_dest_operand_no_defs_between (compare, add,
00608                                                   compare) &&
00609               L_no_danger (L_is_macro (compare->src[compare_operand_num]),
00610                            0 /* load floag */ , 0 /* store flag */ ,
00611                            add, compare))
00612             {
00613               /* move the compare above the add */
00614               L_remove_oper (cb, compare);
00615               L_insert_oper_before (cb, add, compare);
00616               return (2);
00617             }                   /* if */
00618           else
00619             {
00620               /* abort the optimization */
00621               return (0);
00622             }                   /* else */
00623         }                       /* else */
00624     }                           /* if */
00625   return (1);
00626 }                               /* Switch_add_compare_order_if_needed */
00627 
00628 
00629 /****************************************************************************
00630  *
00631  * routine: Change_lte_to_lt()
00632  * purpose: Change a compare from a <= to a <.
00633  * input: compare op
00634  * output:
00635  * returns:
00636  * modified:
00637  * note:
00638  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00639 
00640 static void
00641 Change_lte_to_lt (L_Oper * compare)
00642 {
00643   L_set_compare_type (compare, Lcmp_COM_LT);
00644 
00645   switch (TC_GET_CMP_OP (compare->completers))
00646     {
00647     case TC_CMP_OP_LE:
00648       TC_SET_CMP_OP (compare->completers, TC_CMP_OP_LT);
00649       break;
00650 
00651     case TC_CMP_OP_LEU:
00652       TC_SET_CMP_OP (compare->completers, TC_CMP_OP_LTU);
00653       break;
00654 
00655     default:
00656       L_punt ("Change_lte_to_lt: Unknown compare tahoe op %u on op %d\n",
00657               compare->proc_opc, compare->id);
00658     }                           /* switch */
00659 }                               /* Change_lte_to_lt */
00660 
00661 
00662 /****************************************************************************
00663  *
00664  * routine: Change_gte_to_gt()
00665  * purpose: Change a compare from a >= to a >.
00666  * input: compare op
00667  * output:
00668  * returns:
00669  * modified:
00670  * note:
00671  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00672 
00673 static void
00674 Change_gte_to_gt (L_Oper * compare)
00675 {
00676   L_set_compare_type (compare, Lcmp_COM_GT);
00677 
00678   switch (TC_GET_CMP_OP (compare->completers))
00679     {
00680     case TC_CMP_OP_GE:
00681       TC_SET_CMP_OP (compare->completers, TC_CMP_OP_GT);
00682       break;
00683 
00684     case TC_CMP_OP_GEU:
00685       TC_SET_CMP_OP (compare->completers, TC_CMP_OP_GTU);
00686       break;
00687 
00688     default:
00689       L_punt ("Mopti_compare_height_reductions: Unknown compare "
00690               "tahoe op %u on op %d\n", compare->proc_opc, compare->id);
00691     }                           /* switch */
00692 }                               /* Change_gte_to_gt */
